attributes.review: I came to this app to see how things were going with the presidential election but I was horrified to see a rather hideous being on my screen it was orange and quit large too... it has forced me to let them know my location now random people will just come uninvited they knock on my windows and scream it keeps me up late and I barely sleep the other day I chased one away from my house with a sick this app has forever traumatized me. So please... if you wish to keep your sanity stay away from this app
attributes.title: TERRIBLE...JUST TERRIBLE

attributes.review: iâ€™ve seen some bad apps, but this is by far the WORST. first of all, the app is very difficult to navigate and understand, on top of the terrible design the app brings. you open the app and you are scarred by a horrifying picture of a monster that should be in prison. the cheeto of a man has the words â€œkeep america greatâ€ when in reality, heâ€™s the one making america worse. just by seeing the first page iâ€™m immediately disgusted and triggered, and i hope i will never see this app on the app store ever again.
attributes.title: BAD

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever seen in my whole life. It was the most terrifying, grossest, rudest app ever. My eyes have been scarred. As soon as I opened the app I saw a troll dancing nude. My eyes started to burn. I dropped my phone and screamed. My mom picked up my phone and saw the nude troll and her eyes where also burned. My moms eyes fell out of her head because of it. Luckily I have amazing eyes so my didnâ€™t fall out but damage had been done. I think this app should be taken off the App Store. If not I will be very upset.
attributes.title: Take this app off the App Store now

attributes.title: Cheeto Lookin

attributes.review: This app is very difficult and difunctional. There are too many bugs and they got my location on and no matter how many times I block them for it to not use my location it still finds a way to use it. Ughh never support Donald trump. He is a fraud.
attributes.title: Worst app.

attributes.review: So I launch the app and there is already a problem...it is incredibly outdated and is clearly not formatted for my phone that is barely a year old. But right away it launches and there is a very disgusting photograph of President Donald Trump. Needless to say, NOT SAFE FOR WORK! The app barely functions and there are massive delays after each input. None of this matters though because the app crashes after barely a minute or you tap the screen twice. This is by far the sorriest excuse of an app and needs to be fixed ASAP!
attributes.title: A sloppy excuse

attributes.review: This app is literally awful. Besides the fact that my kid literally started crying because he was scared of the gross sweaty pig on my phone screen, this app has a lot of bugs and glitches and overall just doesnâ€™t work properly. Very disappointed ğŸ˜¾

attributes.review: ever since Iâ€™ve downloaded this app to keep up on my loyalty to sir Cheeto, weird things have been happening...first, my sweet aunt Darlene fell off my roof while trying to get a good tan! Second, I was sleeping and heard this chanting sound from under my pillow, and apparently is was a cult of trumpies trying to convert auntie Darlene even though she is now paralyzed from the roof incident. Third, I woke up to find that Darlene had hung up a zoomed in pic of sir Cheetos shrimp. All in all, this app just brings misfortune and therefore doesnâ€™t need to be downloaded.

attributes.review: this app took 8 full years to finish downloading which wasted all of my time. When it finally did download, I opened the app and my phone lit on fire. Siri started screaming â€œhelp me help meâ€ and I had to use a fire extinguisher to get out the fire. Siri died in the fire and her family will be suing the Trump administration for her death. All of my other apps were terrified of this app and developed severe anxiety and depression. 3 of my apps even committed suicide. This app is so terrible and I will never be using it again.
attributes.title: worst app i ever downloaded
